Topic.Title: looking for some information as a blind creater

Posts.EditableText:
Hi all. I'm trying to figure out if a link looks like this (take sword); and also I'm confused on how to link a passage to a section does it look like this (take sword.); please email me at mysticfire.gaming@gmail.com or please add myv skype at lotr132

Posts.EditableText: How's your screen reading software? If it can't communicate symbols to you effectively, then Squiffy will not be your best option. If it can, many of your questions can be answered [here](http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/).
Posts.HTML: How's your screen reading software? If it can't communicate symbols to you effectively, then Squiffy will not be your best option. If it can, many of your questions can be answered here.
